document_data.caption: [[Syluné]] of Silverdale wearing a ''robe of protection''.
document_data.name: Robe of Protection
document_data.mainbody: A '''robe of protection''' was a [[robe]] that was enchanted to protect the wearer.
document_data.Description: The [[magic]]al robes provided different levels of protection, depending on how highly enchanted they were. As [[mage]]s fought unarmored, these robes were more likely to be worn by them, instead of others that were proficient at wearing [[armor]]. However, the robes could still be worn by those of other professions, such as [[cleric]]s, providing their enchantment was strong enough.
document_data.History: In the 1350s [[DR]], a very strongly enchanted ''robe of protection'' could be found in [[Xanathar]]'s outer sanctum. It belonged to the powerful [[wizard]], [[Kirath]], who also carried many other enchanted items.
